Sentencas: It has been demonstrated that the samarium and neodymium codoped ceria (Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2- abbreviated SNDC) shows high ionic conductivity at intermediate operating temperature (0.012S/cm at 500 degrees C. However, the poor mechanical properties limited its applications in solid fuel cells and oxygen sensors.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: Present research reports an approach to improve the mechanical properties of SNDC by adding another kind of oxide solid electrolyte, the apatite-type lanthanum silicate (La10Si6O27 abbreviated LSO).
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The SNDC/LSO composites were prepared by mixing the powders with different proportion, and sintered at 1600 degrees C. Their structure, morphology, mechanical, and electrical properties were characterized.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: It was found that with the 5wt%-7wt% LSO addition, both the flexural strength and the fracture toughness were improved.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The improvement of flexural strength for the SNDC reached as high as 71%.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: It is also seen that the ionic conductivity of SNDC was enhanced with the adding of 5wt% LSO.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes

Sentencas: The enhanced mechanical properties and electrical conductivity of SNDC/LSO composites make them a promising candidates for high-performance SOFCs and oxygen sensors.
Titulo: Synergetic enhancement of mechanical and electrical properties in Ce0.8Sm0.1Nd0.1O2-/La10Si6O27 composite electrolytes
